import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";

import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Listar Clientes por Estado"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/customers/filter"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

Su propósito es obtener una lista de clientes filtrada por su estado.

***Ejemplo:***  
 - **Método:** GET  
 - **URL:** https://empresa1.demo3pro6.ibu.pe/api/customers/filter?status=active  
 - **TOKEN:** HOHYgwd4atPalTxqi2IIspythpLAU7eP239oByfjk9VuveiOpfUTm4Yg0Szt

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<MimeTabs
  className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}
  schemaType={"request"}
>
  <TabItem
    label={"application/json"}
    value={"application/json"}
  >
    <details
      style={{}}
      className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"}
      data-collapsed={false}
      open={true}
    >
      <summary
        style={{}}
        className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}
      >
        <h3
          className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-parameters"}
        >
          Query Parameters
        </h3>
      </summary>
      <div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}>
        <div style={{"marginTop":"1rem","marginBottom":"1rem"}}>
          Parámetros de consulta disponibles
        </div>
      </div>
      <ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}>
        <SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"status"}
          required={true}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={"posible values: active, inactive"}
          schema={{"type":"string","enum":["active","inactive"],"example":"active"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem>
      </ul>
    </details>
  </TabItem>
</MimeTabs>

<div>
<ApiTabs>

</div>

</SchemaItem>
<SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"telephone"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"954533737"}}>
</SchemaItem>

</SchemaItem>
